definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]

sentences.english: The Porsche stand at the IAA Motor Show , held in Berlin in September 1951.
sentences.chinese: 1951年9月德國法蘭克福車展上的保時捷展位。

sentences.english: The Porsche museum decided to rebuild this car in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 保時捷博物館在2007年決定重建這輛車。

sentences.english: I like sports cars, so I would say Porsche is my favorite.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡運動車，所以我得說保時捷是我的最愛。

sentences.english: These are the best shots yet of the new Porsche 911, which will be unveiled in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 這是迄今爲止全新保時捷911的最好的諜照。

sentences.english: How many has he got? "Oh, I've had my Ferraris and my Porsches."
sentences.chinese: 哦，我曾經買過法拉利和保時捷。

sentences.english: Porsche has unveiled its most fuel-efficient model yet.
sentences.chinese: 保時捷發佈了起品牌迄今爲止燃油效率最高的車型。

sentences.english: Porsche is known throughout the world for creating the ultimate in sports driving machines for every-day use.
sentences.chinese: 保時捷品牌一直給人以日常使用的終極跑車形象。

sentences.english: Porsche Design has been developing and producing chronographs for more than thirty years.
sentences.chinese: 保時捷在計時錶設計上已有超過30年的發展和生產。

sentences.english: Xin Xin, the owner of the Pink Porsche, is already working on her next purchase.
sentences.chinese: 欣欣粉紅色保時捷的主人已經準備下一次購物了。

sentences.english: His room is plastered with pictures of Porsches and Ferraris.
sentences.chinese: 他的房間裏貼滿保時捷和法拉利車的圖片。

sentences.english: It must decide who will drive a Porsche and who will take the bus.
sentences.chinese: 它還必須決定誰將開保時捷，而誰將擠公交車。

sentences.english: I was carved up by a lunatic in a Porsche.
sentences.chinese: 一個開保時捷的瘋子超車搶了我的道。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Porsche launched its new sedan in China first.
sentences.chinese: 同時，保時捷首次在中國推出其新款私家車。

sentences.english: Though the exhaust note of a Porsche Boxster is pretty damn fine, too.
sentences.chinese: 儘管保時捷的排氣聲也是他媽的好聽。

sentences.english: Porsche has had remarkable success selling the large Cayenne there.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，保時捷卡宴的銷售取得了巨大的成功。

sentences.english: Porsche drivers keep their cars tactfully hidden away.
sentences.chinese: 駕駛保時捷的人機智地將其車藏起來。

definition: racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
one's own car (or motorbike)/vehicle for one's private use
enclosed carriage for carrying passengers/motor carriage/car or bus/limousine/CL:部[bu4],輛|辆[liang4]
